On Thu, 11 Apr 2002, Pierre Malraison <pierre.malraison@...>
wrote:

> so i assume i am missing an auxiliary jar of some kind...
> any suggestions? 

First suggestion: ask ant-user@....

Second suggestion: You need a complete Xalan installation on your
CLASSPATH or in ANT_HOME/lib.  If you are using Xalan-2 (which you
should do) this is xalan.jar and xml-apis.jar - the DOM class that
cannot be found is supposed to be in xml-apis AFAIR.

Stefan
